security.title: Built for security
security.subtitle: Your safety is our priority with enterprise-grade security features
security.feature1Description: Only verified, safe applications are allowed, preventing phishing attacks.
security.feature2Description: No need for external wallets or wallet connect. Intuitive design eliminates common user errors, protecting you & your assets

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Arbitrum Accounts
faq.a1: We are covering them for a limited time as part of a grant from Arbitrum. This allows you to experience the full power of Arbitrum without any upfront costs.
faq.q2: How secure is my Arbitrum Account?
faq.a2: Your account uses enterprise-grade security with smart contract technology. We've implemented multiple layers of protection to protect you from the most common scams and user errors that lead to loss of funds.
faq.q3: What can I do with my arbitrum.ac domain?
faq.a3: Your arbitrum.ac domain serves as both your wallet address and your web3 identity. Anyone can send you crypto using your easy-to-remember domain name.
faq.q4: Do I need any special software or extensions?
faq.a4: No additional software required. Arbitrum Accounts works directly in your web browser with just an email login.
